column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Absolutely blown away by this noodle bar! We go every Sunday. The warm and inviting atmosphere is complimented by the excellent customer service and attentive staff. A favorite bowl of ours is the Spicy Chicken Ramen but last time we ventured out and tried the Brussel Sprout Bowl. Impeccable flavor with every bite!! A must try in Houston!!
